body_html:
@girving Thanks for the fix!

I tried with v1.8.0 and the most recent master branch (nightly). On 1.8.0 the crash happens. Interestingly, on nightly there is no crash. I haven't figure out the changes recently between master and v1.8.0 that prevent the crash. I added small test cases in PR #19396.

It is always better to change the empty tensor case early on, and this PR reduces the code duplication significantly 👍 , so this PR looks good to me.
